description:
We need a way to enable SQL logging in the field so that when someone reports "OMG the DB is so slow, Y U not using MongoDB - it is web scale" then we will be able to analyze the problem intelligently.  See Bug #964824 for the sort of issues this can show.

(I proposed an initial patch here https://review.openstack.org/#change,5783 , but apparently the correct procedure is to file a bug and get it merged into master and then essex.)
title: Database logging required
